name: Clippy's Revenge
description:
Winter Game Jam 2021. Will be working on implementing post-processing in the future!

Theme Lost and Found! Lose your arms, lose your sight, lose your body, and a horde of lost things? Find what you want and destroy what you don't! Clippy was never meant to be found again! Desktop version available below!

Daniel Johnico - Coder / VFX

Brandon Smith - Coder / Game Designer

Kaleb Knoettgen - Modeler / Level Designer

Eric Braughman - Modeler / Textures
